title: The figure shows a rectangular circuit that is ...

content.question: One section of wire in the circuit above lies in a region containing a magnetic field B directed into the page. The magnetic force on the section of wire is directed

choices.label: toward the top of the page
toward the bottom of the page

content.answer: toward the bottom of the page

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
